Definition at line 16 of file display_mode.hpp.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ DisplayMode() [1/3]

DeckLink::DisplayMode::DisplayMode ( )
default

Construct an Empty DisplayMode object.

The m_is_initialised variable will be false. Accessing any of the getters of the object will result in a DeckLink::runtime_error being thrown.

◆ DisplayMode() [2/3]

DeckLink::DisplayMode::DisplayMode ( IDeckLinkDisplayMode *  mode)
explicit

Initialise a DisplayMode object from an IDeckLinkDisplayMode object.

In this case the object will be correctly initialised.

Parameters
modeA pointer to the IDeckLinkDisplayMode from which to retrieve the display mode information.

◆ is_valid()

bool DeckLink::DisplayMode::is_valid ( ) const
inline

Was this instance initialised from a valid IDeckLinkDisplayMode.

If the object was default constructed then no display mode was provided and the width, height, etc variables are unset.

Returns
Whether the display mode is initialised
